section.title: Limitations
section.b: Authentication with external authentication systems (LDAP, Active Directory (AD) or Identity Providers)

ul.li: No Horizon web portal support currently exists for the creation and management of external authentication system configurations.
No Horizon web portal support currently exists for the creation and management of federation configurations.

section.b: Missing quota information for compute resources

p.note: An error message that will appear in the default Horizon page if you are running a Swift-only deployment (no Compute service). In this configuration, you will not see any quota information for Compute resources and will see the following error message:

p.i: The Compute service is not installed or is not configured properly. No information is available for Compute resources.

section.p: This error message is expected as no Compute service is configured for this deployment. Please ignore the error message.
